response.headline: Little Edo Kawagoe - traditional Japanese town 40 minutes from Tokyo
response.summary: Little Edo Kawagoe is located 40 minutes from Tokyo and offers a traditional Japanese experience away from overcrowded tourist areas. The historic town features traditional architecture and cultural sites.
